EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us: Querying External Data Sources with Hadoop Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Join us <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/hadoop/querying-external-data-sources-with-hadoop-webinar> for our next webinar – Querying External Data Sources with Hadoop– on Tuesday, July 15, 2014 at 9AM PDT/5PM GMT+1. In large enterprises, it is not uncommon to have big data in different formats, sizes and stored across different systems. Moreover, enterprises typically have a multitude of systems with gold mines of information that can be put to use for strategic insights. Linking these existing storage systems with HDFS can be very challenging. Register now <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/hadoop/querying-external-data-sources-with-hadoop-webinar> to learn how Pivotal helps leverage your existing data infrastructure investments with HDFS and begins to shift your legacy enterprise data warehouse, analytical data marts and data silos into a centrally modern, governed business data lake – all with Pivotal Xtension Frameworks (PXF). QUERYING EXTERNAL DATA SOURCES WITH HADOOP TUESDAY JULY 15, 2014 9:00AM PDT 5:00PM GMT+1 REGISTER <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/hadoop/querying-external-data-sources-with-hadoop-webinar>
